content.text: Choosing Between a Scrubber and a Scroll View

inlineContent.text: When choosing between a scrubber and a scroll view, use a scrubber unless the amount of content, or the nature of your content, doesnâ€™t work well in a scrubber. Scrubber interaction is optimized for the Touch Bar, typically making a scrubber the better option for letting the user pick from among several choices, such as dates in a calendar.
